example: Tenho uma consulta amanhã às nove.
exampleTranslation: I have an appointment tomorrow at nine.
The nurse updated the medical record.

example: Preciso fazer um exame de sangue.
exampleTranslation: I need to take a blood test.
Your blood pressure is high.

example: O médico ainda não fechou o diagnóstico.
exampleTranslation: The doctor has not reached a diagnosis yet.
What are your symptoms?
I have had a fever since yesterday.
I have a constant headache.

example: Preciso de um atestado médico para o trabalho.
exampleTranslation: I need a medical certificate for work.

example: Marque um retorno em duas semanas.
exampleTranslation: Schedule a follow-up in two weeks.
She is going to see a specialist.
Let's start with the medical history.
Which health insurance do you use?
Do you take any ongoing medication?
Are your vaccinations up to date?

example: Os exames ficam no prontuário eletrônico.
exampleTranslation: The tests are in the electronic health record.

example: Vou enviar a receita digital por e-mail.
exampleTranslation: I will send the digital prescription by email.
The heartbeat is regular.

example: Você precisa fazer um raio-x do braço.
exampleTranslation: You need to take an x-ray of your arm.

example: O paciente recebeu alta médica hoje.
exampleTranslation: The patient was discharged today.
